dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
Slope Wallet
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet to access your media database. If not, you will not be able to use the materials in the system media database in slope wallet.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet to turn on your sport feature. If you don't, you won't be able to use the bluetooth function in slope wallet.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet access to your bluetooth. If not, you will not be able to use the bluetooth in slope wallet.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet to access your mobile calendar, and then you can display the schedule on your mobile calendar on "slope wallet schedule".
You can use the scan QR code / photo upload function of slope wallet to open the camera permission. slope wallet will not open the camera permission without permission. Please feel free to use it.

Click "OK" to allow slope wallet to access your address book. If not, slope wallet user recommendation and department communication collaboration function will not be used. At the same time, in order to ensure the experience, the message content will be written in the bottom layer of the address book, so that you can quickly receive all kinds of message reminders. Your address book will be encrypted and protected. Please feel free to use it.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet to access your Face ID, and then you can use Face ID to login.

slope wallet will not connect to the devices on your network, but only detect the connectivity with your local gateway. Users can also modify the permission settings of the app in the interface of Settings > Privacy > local network.
You can use location, weather and other functions to turn on location service. slope wallet will not turn on location service without permission. Please rest assured to use it.
You can use location, weather and other functions to turn on location service. slope wallet will not turn on location service without permission. Please rest assured to use it.

You can use slope wallet's send / upload voice information function to turn on the microphone permission. slope wallet will not turn on the microphone permission without permission. Please rest assured to use it.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet to turn on your sport feature. If you don't, you won't be able to use the motion function in slope wallet.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet access to your album. If not, you will not be able to use the photos and videos in the system album in slope wallet.
Click "OK" to allow slope wallet access to your album. If not, you will not be able to use the photos and videos in the system album in slope wallet.
Open the voice recognition function, slope wallet will not open the voice recognition function without permission, please rest assured to use.

Main
